019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common;
020
021import io.kubernetes.client.Discovery.APIResource;
022import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
023import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1Service;
024import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ServiceList;
025import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.ListOptions;
026import java.util.Collection;
027import java.util.List;
028
029/**
030 * A stub for secrets (v1).
031 */
032@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
033public class K8sV1ServiceStub extends K8sGenericStub<V1Service, V1ServiceList> {
034
035    public static final APIResource CONTEXT = new APIResource("", List.of("v1"),
036        "v1", "Service", true, "services", "service");
037
038    /**
039     * Instantiates a new stub.
040     *
041     * @param client the client
042     * @param namespace the namespace
043     * @param name the name
044     */
045    protected K8sV1ServiceStub(K8sClient client, String namespace,
046            String name) {
047        super(V1Service.class, V1ServiceList.class, client, CONTEXT, namespace,
048            name);
049    }
050
051    /**
052     * Gets the stub for the given namespace and name.
053     *
054     * @param client the client
055     * @param namespace the namespace
056     * @param name the name
057     * @return the config map stub
058     */
059    public static K8sV1ServiceStub get(K8sClient client, String namespace,
060            String name) {
061        return new K8sV1ServiceStub(client, namespace, name);
062    }
063
064    /**
065     * Get the stubs for the objects in the given namespace that match
066     * the criteria from the given options.
067     *
068     * @param client the client
069     * @param namespace the namespace
070     * @param options the options
071     * @return the collection
072     * @throws ApiException the api exception
073     */
074    public static Collection<K8sV1ServiceStub> list(K8sClient client,
075            String namespace, ListOptions options) throws ApiException {
076        return K8sGenericStub.list(V1Service.class, V1ServiceList.class, client,
077            CONTEXT, namespace, options,
078            (clnt, nscp, name) -> new K8sV1ServiceStub(clnt, nscp, name));
079    }
080}
